title: swift: on OVH - Crypt remote: error EOF

milestone.title: Known Problem
milestone.description: This milestone contains issues which are known problems which are proving difficult to fix, or are awaiting an external fix or we haven't got round to yet.

body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

rclone cannot read / write / list files inside of a `secret` remote (https://rclone.org/crypt/).

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
# rclone version
rclone v1.50.2-170-g7cf8ea35-beta
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.13.6
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

```
# lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID:	Debian
Description:	Debian GNU/Linux 10 (buster)
Release:	10
Codename:	buster

# uname -r
4.19.0-6-amd64
```

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

OVH Public Cloud storage
```
[home_storage_backup_ovh_pci]
type = swift
env_auth = false
user = xxx
key = xxx
auth = https://auth.cloud.ovh.net/v2.0
user_id =
domain =
tenant = xxx
tenant_id = xxx
tenant_domain =
region = DE1
storage_url = https://storage.de1.cloud.ovh.net/v1/AUTH_xxxxxxx/home_storage_backup
auth_token =
auth_version = 2
endpoint_type =

[secret]
type = crypt
remote = home_storage_backup_ovh_pci:home_storage_backup
filename_encryption = standard
directory_name_encryption = true
password = xxx
password2 = xxx
```

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone lsd secret:/ -vv`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
# rclone lsd secret:/ -vv
2020/01/20 09:17:20 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.50.2-170-g7cf8ea35-beta" starting with parameters ["rclone" "lsd" "secret:/" "-vv"]
2020/01/20 09:17:20 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2020/01/20 09:17:22 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 1/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:22 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 10ms
2020/01/20 09:17:22 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 2/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:22 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 20ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 3/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 40ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 4/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 80ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 5/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 160ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 6/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 320ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 7/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 640ms
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 8/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:23 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 1.28s
2020/01/20 09:17:24 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 9/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:24 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 2s
2020/01/20 09:17:25 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 10/10 (error EOF)
2020/01/20 09:17:25 ERROR : : error listing: EOF
2020/01/20 09:17:25 Failed to lsd with 2 errors: last error was: EOF
```

It seems like it's an issue with the crypt remote, because 
`rclone lsf home_storage_backup_ovh_pci:/`
works fine and lists the files, that were crypted with the `crypt remote`
